name: Refractories Anchors
deskripsi_singkat: Refractory Anchors specializes in the manufacture of high temperature alloy and stainless fasteners used to anchor refractories in furnaces and process equipment
deskripsi: Refractory Anchors specializes in the manufacture of high temperature alloy and stainless fasteners used to anchor refractories in furnaces and process equipment. Refractory anchor hardware is wire formed, die stamped, and roll threaded and welded into a variety of anchoring products for castable monolithic, abrasion resistant and ceramic fiber refractory linings.

name: Hydraulic Parts
deskripsi_singkat: We supply genuine spare parts and components of high quality hydraulic equipment manufacturers such as Brevini and Samydraulik
deskripsi: We supply genuine spare parts and components of high quality hydraulic equipment manufacturers such as Brevini and Samydraulik

name: Customize Casting Parts
deskripsi_singkat: Refractory Anchors specializes in the manufacture of high temperature alloy and stainless fasteners used to anchor refractories in furnaces and process equipment
deskripsi: From cast iron to steel casting to aluminum cast, we delivers high-quality industrial casting parts for technical equipment used in special machinery within the automation industry

name: Industrial De Dusting
deskripsi_singkat: Refractory Anchors specializes in the manufacture of high temperature alloy and stainless fasteners used to anchor refractories in furnaces and process equipment
deskripsi: We offers a wide range of bag and sleeve filters adjusted to high or small capacities. This limited sized range provides a multi-use system to be used for machines or units dusting
